name: ZootopiaX Token
description: ZootopiaX is a Web3-native ecosystem combining GameFi, NFTs, and DAO governance on the BNB Smart Chain. The ZOTX token powers a vibrant pet-themed platform that features mining gameplay, staking rewards, social interactions, and real-world utility. Players can earn ZOTX PAY through interactive experiences, unlock NFT memories, participate in pet mining, and engage in decentralized governance, fostering a sustainable and user-driven crypto environment.
